info.title: Commerce
info.description: [Zoom Commerce](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/commerce/) APIs allows partners to manage subscriptions, enable intergrations, and more.

post.description:
Creates an end customer account. 
**Note** Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](/docs/api).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:sub_account:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

website.description: The company's website. It should not be any social media handle or Facebook, Google, and eBay shopping front.

contacts.description: The account's contact details. Provide at least one contact.

first_name.description: The contact's first name.

last_name.description: The contact's last name.

company_email.description: The contact's company email ID. The email domain should be the same as the account domain.

postal_code.description: The postal or ZIP code.

country.description: The ISO country code.

201.description: The account creation request was submitted successfully.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracking the API call.

create_reference_id.description: The unique reference ID for this account creation process. Please use this ID for checking the status.

crm_account_number.description: The unique CRM account number.

status.description: The supported status.

status_detail.description: The details in case of partial success or failure.
status_detail.example: one or more contact creation failed.

post.summary: Add contacts to an existing end customer or your own account.
post.description:
Add contacts to an existing end customer or your own account.
Note: Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:update:account:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: accountKey
parameters.description: A unique account key. It can be either the CRM account number or the account create reference ID or the Zoom account number.

contacts.description: The contact details for the account. At least one contact should be provided.

first_name.description: The contact's first name.

last_name.description: The contact's last name.

company_email.description: The contact's company email ID. The email domain should be same as the account domain.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

create_reference_id.description: The unique reference ID for this account creation process. Use this Id for checking the status.

crm_account_number.description: The unique CRM account number.

status.description: The supported status: submitted, success, partial success, or error.

status_detail.description: The details in case of partial success or error.
status_detail.example: one or more contact creation failed.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request See details. **Error Code:** `5105`
First name must be at most 40 characters
**Error Code:** `5106`
First name cannot be blank.
**Error Code:** `5107`
Last name must be at most 80 characters.
**Error Code:** `5108`
Last name cannot be blank.
**Error Code:** `5109`
Job title must be at most 128 characters.
**Error Code:** `5110`
Invalid company email.
**Error Code:** `5111`
Company email must be at most 80 characters.
**Error Code:** `5112`
Business phone must be at most 15 characters.
**Error Code:** `5121`
Account create or update already in progress.
**Error Code:** `5130`
Company email cannot be blank.
**Error Code:** `5139`
At least 1 account contact is required, and company emails must be unique and have the same domain.
**Error Code:** `5138`
Invalid contact primary role.
**Error Code:** `5120`
No account found.

get.summary: Get the list of all accounts associated with a Zoom Partner/Sub-Reseller, by the account type
get.description:
Returns the list of all accounts associated with a Zoom Partner and Sub-Reseller, by the account type - endCustomer, subReseller, and relatedPartner.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:account:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: relationship_type
parameters.description: The relationship type by which to filter the results.

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: The full or partial name of the account. It has a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The ISO code for the account currency.

parameters.name: partner_type
parameters.description: Comma-separated partner types to filter on if the relationship_type is subReseller, relatedPartner, or siblings.

parameters.name: crm_account_number
parameters.description: The full or partial CRM account number. It has a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: zoom_account_number
parameters.description: The full or partial Zoom account number. It has a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: create_reference_id
parameters.description: The create reference ID for the account.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_crm_account_number
parameters.description: The full CRM account number for the sub-reseller. If this is provided and account_type is endCustomer, only end customers related to this sub-reseller will be returned in the response.

parameters.name: sibling_crm_account_number
parameters.description: The full CRM account number of a sibling account. If this filter is used, all the end customer, sub-reseller, sibling, or related partner accounts returned by the API will be in context of this account.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned per page in the response. Maximum 100.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number for fetching the next page of the result set.

200.description: This endpoint returns the end customer account list.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

get.summary: Gets all billing documents for a distributor or a reseller
get.description:
Returns all billing documents for a distributor or a reseller. Billing Documents represent the end customer's invoices, credit memos and debit memos. The response can be filtered by status, document date etc. By default, the list of unpaid invoices in the last 1 month are retrieved.
Note: Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:billing_documents:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: document_type
parameters.description: The invoice, credit_memo, and debit_memo. The default is invoice.

parameters.name: payment_status
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents by payment status. Accepted values: paid, unpaid, and all. By default all documents are returned.

parameters.name: document_date_start
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents where document date is on or after the date provided in YYYY-MM-DD format. The default is one month.

parameters.name: document_date_end
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents where document date is on or before the date provided in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: due_date
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents where document due on date is on the date provided in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: document_number
parameters.description: This filed filters the list of documents by the document number, like invoice number, credit memo number and so on. Any document number which contains the parameter value will be returned.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The ISO currency code. The default shows documents in all currencies.

parameters.name: end_customer_name
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents by the end customer account name. The minimum three characters should be provided.

parameters.name: exclude_zero_balance_invoices
parameters.description: This field filters the list of documents by the invoice balance. All zero dollar invoices will be filtered out from the response if the value is true. By default it is false.

parameters.name: invoice_owner_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters invoices by the CRM account number for the Invoice Owner.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned in a page. The minimum value is one and the maximum is 99. Default is 10.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The token for the next page in the record set if results have more records than the number specified by the page size. The next page token paginates through a large set of result. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: This field specifies the sort order of the list. Sorting can be ascending (asc) or descending (desc). The fields on which this list can be sorted are document number, document date, due date, and balance. By default the list is sorted by document date. ascending.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

document_type.description: The type of the billing document: invoice, credit memo, or debit memo.

sub_reseller_name.description: The sub-reseller name if the subscription was created by a distributor on their behalf.

payment_status.description: The status of the document: paid or unpaid.

currency.description: The ISO code for the currency.

balance.description: This field represents the sale price, list price, net amount, or gross amount.

currency.description: The ISO code for the currency.

net_amount.description: This field represents sale price, list price, net amount, or gross amount.

billing_description.description: The description or any other detail about the document.

posted_date.description: The posted date for the document.

reason_detail.description: The reason description or detail for which this document has been generated.

reference_billing_document_id.description: Any other billing document associated with this invoice or credit memo or debit memo.

items.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.

next_page_token.description: The token for the next page in the record set if result has more records than the number specified by the page size. The next page token paginates through a large set of results. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request See details. **Error Code:** `5504`
Payment Status valid values are : paid, unpaid, and all.
**Error Code:** `5505`
Date range cannot be more than 3 years.
**Error Code:** `5002`
Invalid date format. Expected format: YYYY-MM-DD.
**Error Code:** `5008`
Invalid page size. It must be between 1 and 99.
**Error Code:** `5506`
5506 - Invalid sort values. It must be one of: documentNumber.asc, documentDate.asc, dueDate.asc, balance.asc, documentNumber.desc, documentDate.desc, dueDate.desc, and balance.desc.
**Error Code:** `5507`
Multiples fields not supported in sorting.

post.summary: Creates a new deal registration for a partner
post.description:
Creates a new Deal Registration for a partner.
Note: Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:deal_registration:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: invoice-owner-crm-account-number
parameters.description: The CRM account number for the Invoice Owner if it is one of the sibling accounts.

requestBody.description: Creates a new deal registration for a partner.

opportunity_type.description: The type of opportunity being registered.

sub_reseller_crm_account_number.description: The sub-reseller CRM account number on whose behalf this deal is being submitted.

sales_rep_contact_crm_number.description: Unique identifier for the partner contact who will be the primary sales representative.

partner_contacts.description: Additional partner contacts who will be associated with this deal registration.

end_customer_crm_account_number.description: CRM account number for the end customer.

end_customer_contact_crm_number.description: Contact CRM number of the primary contact for the end customer.

end_customer_contacts.description: Additional end customer contacts who will be associated with this deal registration.

items.description: Deal registration end customer contact details.

met_decision_maker.description: Set to true if the partner has met the end customer's decision maker. Defaults to false.

decision_maker_crm_number.description: End customer decision maker contact's CRM number.

budget_identified.description: Set to true if the partner has identified the budget with the end customer's decision maker. Defaults to false.

is_public_sector.description: Set to true if the end customer is a Public Sector Customer. Defaults to false. Public Sector Customer means any United States of America Federal customer (legislative branch, executive branch, judicial branch, and military services), State and Local customer (all legislative, executive, administrative, and judicial agencies within a State, County, City, or Town), Federal System Integrator customer (government contractors doing work on behalf of or selling to Federal Agencies), Public Higher Education School or Institution customers, or Public K-12 School customers.

buy_gov_skus.description: Set to true if the end customer is a public sector company and will buy Zoom for Government (ZfG) SKUs.

end_customer_industry.description: Industry category that best describes the end customer's products/services. Supported values are Commercial, FED, SLED, Education, Federal, State & Local.

estimated_close_date.description: Estimated close date for the opportunity. Should be today or a future date.

estimated_mrr.description: Estimated size of the opportunity in Monthly Recurring Revenue.

currency.description: ISO currency code for the deal.

requires_professional_services.description: Set to true if any professional or managed services will be provided as part of this opportunity.

professional_services_description.description: A description of the partner-led professional or managed services. Recommended if "requires_professional_services" is true.

professional_services_delivered_by.description: Comma-separated list of PSO services delivery agents.

phone_carrier.description: Does the customer have an existing phone carrier agreement. Supported values are "Yes, and they want to maintain it", "Yes, but they are willing to switch", "There is no existing agreement", "I dont know".
phone_carrier.example: Yes, and they want to maintain it
enum: Yes, and they want to maintain it
Yes, but they are willing to switch

product_groups.description: Zoom product types for which this deal will be eligible.

quantity.description: Expected license quantity.

campaign_number.description: Valid Zoom campaign number which influenced this deal.

sales_activities.description: Sales activities associated with this deal.

post.summary: Create a subscription order for a Zoom partner
post.description:
Create a subscription order for a Zoom partner's end customers. One order can have more than one subscription for more than one end customer. The same order can create a new subscription and also amend an existing subscription. 
**Note** Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:order:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.description: The CRM account number for the invoice owner if it is one of the sibling accounts.

order_description.example: New Contact Center subscription for ABC Pvt. Ltd.

term_period.description: The duration of the term in months. Only applicable if the value of the `term_type` field is TERMED. Allowed values are 12, 24, 36, 48, and 60.

start_date.description: The start date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

post.summary: Preview delta order metrics and subscriptions in an order
post.description:
Previews the delta order metrics and subscriptions in an order. Validates the order and gets the metrics like TCV, applicable discounts, and net MRR before placing the order for provisioning. This operation is only an order preview, and no order is submitted for fulfillment. To submit the order, use the [order API](/docs/api/commerce/#tag/order/POST/commerce/order/preview). \n**Note** Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](/docs/api).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:order:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

get.summary: Gets all orders for a Zoom partner.
get.description:
Returns all orders for a Zoom partner based on specified filters.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:order:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: invoice_owner_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters orders by the CRM account number for the Invoice Owner.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned per page in the response.

parameters.name: page_num
parameters.description: The page number for fetching the next page of the result set.

parameters.name: date_filter_option
parameters.description: The date type to filter on. Supported values are "effectiveDate", "createdDate" and "updatedDate". The default is effectiveDate.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: This field indicates the start date to filter the result. The result will only contain the orders with the date of date_filter_option later than or equal to this date. The range cannot be more than 3 years.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date to filter the result. The result will only contain the orders with the date of date_filter_option earlier than or equal to this date. The range cannot be more than 3 years.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description: This field filters results by order type. Supported values are 'trial' and 'sale'.

parameters.name: order_reference_id
parameters.description: This field filters results based on order reference ID.

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on order number.

parameters.name: po_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on purchase order number.

parameters.name: deal_reg_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on deal registration number.

parameters.name: end_customer_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on end customer name. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on end customer CRM account number. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_zoom_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on a subscription number. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on the sub-reseller name. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on sub-reseller CRM account number. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: invoice_owner_name
parameters.description: This field filters orders by the Invoice Owner name.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: This field filters the results by order status.

parameters.name: subscription_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on a subscription number. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: transaction_type
parameters.description: This field filters results based on the transaction type for the order. Possible values are New or Amend.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: This field sorts the result by any one of the supported fields - `orderNumber`, `orderReferenceId`, `zoomAccountNumber`, `dealRegistrationNumber`, `poNumber`, `subResellerName`, `status`, `effectiveDate`, or `updatedDate`. The default is `updatedDate`.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

page_count.description: The total number of pages in the result set.

order_reference_id.description: The reference ID for a draft order.

order_number.description: The order number of the order.

status.description: The status of the order. Supported values are "draft", "failedToSubmit", "completed", "canceled", "submitted", "failed".

transaction_type.description: The transaction type for the order. Possible values are New or Amend.

invoice_owner_crm_account_number.description: The CRM account number for the Invoice Owner.

invoice_owner_name.description: The name of the Invoice Owner account.

end_customer_account_number.description: The end customer's Zoom account number.

end_customer_crm_account_number.description: The end customer's CRM account number.

sub_reseller_name.description: The sub-reseller's name if the order was placed by a distributor on their behalf.

sub_reseller_crm_account_number.description: The sub-reseller's CRM account number if the order was placed by a distributor on their behalf.

creation_date.description: The date when this order was created.

effective_date.description: The date when this order was activated. Also the contract's effective date.

currency.description: The ISO code for the currency.

net_amount.description: The net order value.

tcv.description: Total contract value. This is the total amount that has been booked over the duration of the charge.

updated_date.description: The date when this order was last updated.

trade_screening.description: Flag to indicate whether the subscription cleared trade screening check or not.

deal_reg_number.description: The registration number of the deal registered by partner or reseller.

Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:order:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: orderReferenceId
parameters.description: Order reference ID.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

order_type.description: Type of order - sale or trial.

transaction_type.description: The transaction type for the order. Possible values are New or Amend.

order_description.example: New Contact Center subscription for ABC Pvt. Ltd.

status.description: The order's status. Supported values are `draft`, `failedToSubmit`, `completed`, `canceled`, `submitted`, `failed`.

order_number.description: The billing system order number when the order is successfully submitted or completed.

deal_reg_number.description: Registration Number of the deal registered by partner/reseller

trade_screening.description: The flag to indicate whether the subcription cleared trade screening check or not.

tcv.description: Total contract value. This is the total amount that has been booked over the duration of the charge.

tcb.description: Total contracted billing. This is the forecast value at the time of booking for the total amount that will be billed over the duration of the charge.

total_net_amount.description: Total net amount, the sum of all the offers in this order.

order_metrics.description: Order metrics like tcv, mrr, or tcb.

subscription_number.description: Subscription number of the subscription, which is created or updated. Will be blank if subscription creation is not complete.

period_type.description: Unit of time that the term is measured in. Only applicable if the value of the term_type field is TERMED. Supported values are `Month` or `Year`.

term_period.description: The duration of the term in months. Only applicable if the value of the `term_type` field is TERMED. Allowed values are 12, 24, 36, 48, or 60.

start_date.description: Start date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: End date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

contract_effective_date.description: Date when the contract will be effective from. It is a required field to provide in the order when order action type is `createSubscription`, in YYYY-MM-DD format and if `order_date` is different from contract effective date.

service_activation_date.description: Date when the service will be activated from, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

customer_acceptance_date.description: Date when the order was approved by the customer. This is a required field to provide in the order when the order action type is `addOffer`, `createSubscription`, `addOn`, `upgrade`, `upsell`, and `renewSubscription`, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

sold_to_crm_contact_number.description: CRM contact number for the sold to contact.

end_customer_language.description: The language used to set communication and invoice profile for the end customer.

payment_term.description: Payment term for this subscription. If null, will be defaulted to the payment term associated with the account.

service_start_date.description: Service start date. Equal to or before `paid_period_start_date`.

paid_period_start_date.description: Subscription paid period start date. Required if the subscription has free periods.

free_months_included.description: True if the order created a free period subscription.

free_months_reason_code.description: Reason for free period in the subscription. Required if the subscription has free period.

post.summary: Upload an attachment pdf file in context of a deal registration or quote

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description for the attachment.

parameters.name: associated_object_type
parameters.description: Context object type - Quote, Deal etc. Pass "Quote" in this field with the attached is for a quote.

parameters.name: associated_reference_id
parameters.description: Unique reference id for the associated object. If the "associated_object_type" is "Quote", pass quote_reference_id in this field.

file.description: Attachment file. Only PDF format supported.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

document_reference_id.description: Unique reference id for the uploaded file.

Associated object reference id is required.

Returns the Zoom product catalog for a Zoom Partner.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:product_catalog:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

filter_options.description: This field filters the results based on criteria. Multiple filter criteria can be provided.

filter_by.description: Filters by `offerType`, `billingPeriod`, `currency`, `country`, `offerIds`, `partnerSkuCodes`, `priceListIds`, 'quoteEligible' and 'sector'. By default, the API will filter by 'offerType=plan', 'currency=USD'.

filter_value.description: The filter values are separated by commas. For offerType, supported values are - plan, standalone, configurable, isv, addon. For billingPeriod, supported values are - Month, Quarter, Annual, Semi-Annual, Two Years, Three Years, Week, Subscription Term. For sector, supported values are - Commercial, USDOD and GOV.

items.description: This field filters options through the Zoom product catalog.

only_trial_eligible.description: If true, the API returns only trial-eligible offers or add-ons. The default is false.

only_base_plans.description: If `only_base_plans` = true, the API returns only base plan offers. Only one of these criteria: `only_base_plans` or `upgrade_offer_id` should be specified in the request.

upgrade_offer_id.description: If this criterion is selected, the API returns only applicable upgrade offers in the response. Only one of these criteria: `only_base_plans` or `upgrade_offer_id` should be specified in the request.

**Note** Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](/docs/api/).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:quote:admin`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

quote_description.example: New ZCC subscription for ABC Pvt. Ltd.

negotiation_note.description: A note for negotiation deal for the quote.

post.summary: Preview delta quote metrics and subscriptions in a quote
post.description:
Previews the delta quote metrics, and subscriptions in a quote. The API can be used to validate the quote and get the metrics like TCV, applicable discounts, and net MRR, before submitting the quote for actual creation and provisioning. This operation is only a quote preview and no quote is submitted for approval and fulfillment. For submitting the quote use the quote API.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:quote:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

get.summary: Gets all quotes for a Zoom partner
get.description:
Returns all quotes for a Zoom partner based on specified filters.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:quote:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned per page in the response.

parameters.name: page_num
parameters.description: The page number for fetching the next page of the result set.

parameters.name: date_filter_option
parameters.description: The date type to filter on. Default is effectiveDate.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: This field indicates the from date to filter the result. The result will only contain the quotes with the date of date_filter_option later than or equal to this date. The range can not be more than 3 years.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To date to filter the result. The result will only contain the quotes with the date of date_filter_option earlier than or equal to this date. The range can not be more than 3 years.

parameters.name: quote_type
parameters.description: This field filters results by `quote_type`. Supported values are 'trial', 'sale'.

parameters.name: quote_reference_id
parameters.description: This field filters results based on quote reference ID. It should be minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: quote_number
parameters.description: This field filter results based on quote number. It should be minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: po_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on purchase order number.

parameters.name: deal_reg_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on deal registration number.

parameters.name: end_customer_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on End customer name. It should be minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on End customer CRM account number. It should be minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_zoom_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on a subscription number. It should be a minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on a subscription number. It should be a minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on sub-reseller CRM account number. It should be a minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: invoice_owner_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters orders by the CRM account number for the Invoice Owner.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: This field filters the results by quote status.

parameters.name: subscription_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on a subscription number. It should be a minimum of 3 characters.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: This field sorts the result by any one of the supported fields. Default is `updatedDate`.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

page_count.description: The total number of pages in the result set.

quote_reference_id.description: The reference ID for a draft quote.

quote_number.description: The quote number of the quote.

status.description: The status of the quote.

end_customer_account_number.description: The end customer's Zoom account number.

end_customer_crm_account_number.description: The end customer's CRM account number.

sub_reseller_name.description: The sub-reseller's name if the quote was placed by a distributor on their behalf.

invoice_owner_name.description: The sub-reseller's name if the quote was placed by a distributor on their behalf.

invoice_owner_crm_account_number.description: The invoice owner's CRM account number if the quote was placed by a distributor on their behalf.

creation_date.description: The date when this quote was created.

effective_date.description: The date when this quote was activated. Also the contract's effective date.

net_amount.description: The net quote value.

updated_date.description: The date when this quote was last updated.

trade_screening.description: The flag to indicate whether the subcription cleared trade screening check or not.

**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized Authorization information is missing or invalid.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

get.summary: Get quote details by quote reference ID
get.description:
Get quote details by quote reference ID. 
**Note** Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](/docs/api).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:quote:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

**Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: quoteReferenceId
parameters.description: Quote reference ID.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

quote_type.description: Type of quote - sale or trial.

transaction_type.description: The transaction type for the quote. Possible values are New or Amend.

quote_description.example: New ZCC subscription for ABC Pvt. Ltd.

status.description: The status of the quote.

quote_number.description: The billing system quote number when the quote is successfully submitted or completed.

deal_reg_number.description: Registration number of the deal registered by partner or reseller.

quote_expiry_date.description: The date when quote will expire. If not provided, the quote will expire in 30 days from the date of creation. Max allowed expiry date is 180 days.

trade_screening.description: The flag to indicate whether the subscription cleared trade screening check or not.

tcv.description: Total contract value. This is the total amount that has been booked over the duration of the charge.

tcb.description: Total contracted billing. This is the forecast value at the time of booking for the total amount that will be billed over the duration of the charge.

quote_metrics.description: Quote metrics like total contract value (tcv), monthly recurring revenue (mrr), total contracted billing (tcb).

partner_note.description: Note or comment added by the partner.

action_by.description: Note or comment added by Partner or Zoom team.

patch.summary: Update a subscription quote for a Zoom partner
patch.description:
Update a subscription quote for a Zoom partner's end customers. Approved quotes cannot be updated.
Note: Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:quote:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: quoteReferenceId
parameters.description: The quote's unique reference ID.

requestBody.description: Update a quote for a Zoom partner.

quote_description.example: New ZCC subscription for ABC Pvt. Ltd.

quote_date.description: The quote date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

quote_expiry_date.description: The date when the quote will expire. If not provided, the quote will expire in 30 days from the date of creation. Maximum allowed expiry date is 180 days.

negotiation_note.description: A note for negotiation deal for the quote.
negotiation_note.example: Quote updated as per approval comment.

additional_attributes.description: Any additional attributes that need to be tracked for this quote.

term_period.description: The duration of the term in months. Only applicable if the value of the `term_type` field is TERMED. Allowed values are 12, 24, 36, 48, or 60.

start_date.description: The start date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

end_date.description: The end date of the term, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

patch.summary: Submits a subscription quote for provisioning
patch.description:
Submits a subscription quote for provisioning. Only approved quotes can be submitted for fulfillment.
Note: Check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:write:quote:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: quoteReferenceId
parameters.description: Unique reference ID for the quote.

requestBody.description: This setting submits a quote for a Zoom partner.

comments.description: Additional comments or notes to be added to the quote negotiation notes before provisioning.
comments.example: Submmitting for fulfillment after exception approval.

documents.description: Array of document or attachment ids uploaded for the quote.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request See details. **Error Code:** `6200`
Purchase order number is required.
**Error Code:** `6201`
Document numbers exceed acceptable limit.
**Error Code:** `6202`
Purchase Order document is required
**Error Code:** `6203`
Customer acceptance document is required

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized Authorization information is missing or invalid.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request. **Error Code:** `6220`
Unable to submit quote for fulfillment. Please try again later.

get.summary: Gets paid subscriptions for a Zoom partner.
get.description:
Returns paid subscriptions for a distributor or a reseller. The subscriptions list can be filtered by end customer account number, subscription status, subscription number, start and end dates. By default, the list of active subscriptions in the last 1 month are retrieved.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:subscription:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM` **Not supported in Gov cluster**

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The maximum number of results returned in a page. Minimum value is 1 and maximum is 99. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: This field specifies the sort order of the list. Sorting can be ascending or descending. The fields on which this list can be sorted: `subscriptionNumber`, `startDate`, `endDate`. By default the list is sorted by most recent subscription.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Ths field filters the list of subscriptions by status. By default all active subscriptions are returned. Accepted values are active, expired, trials, renewal.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: This field filters the list of subscriptions by subscription start date on or after the date provided in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: This field filters the list of subscriptions by subscription end date on or before the date provided in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: This field filters the list of subscriptions by duration. By default subscriptions for last 1 month are retrieved. Accepted values are lastMonth, lastQuarter, lastYear. Either start/end dates or the duration should be provided.

parameters.name: end_customer_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on End customer name. It should be minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on End customer CRM account number. It should be minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: end_customer_zoom_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on End customer Zoom account number. It should be minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_name
parameters.description: This field filters results based on sub-reseller name. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: sub_reseller_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters results based on sub-reseller CRM account number. It should be a minimum of three characters.

parameters.name: subscription_number
parameters.description: This field filters the list of subscriptions by subscription number.

parameters.name: invoice_owner_crm_account_number
parameters.description: This field filters subscriptions by the CRM account number for the Invoice Owner.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The token for the next page in the record set if result has more records than the number specified by the page size. The next page token  paginates through large result sets. It returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

x-zm-trackingid.description: A Zoom custom identifier for tracing the API call.

crm_account_number.description: The unique CRM account number.

zoom_account_number.description: The Zoom account number (ZAN).

subscription_owner.description: The account identifiers and the name.

crm_account_number.description: The unique CRM account number.

zoom_account_number.description: The Zoom account number (ZAN).

invoice_owner.description: The account identifiers and the name.

start_date.description: The date when the subscription starts.

end_date.description: The date when the subscription ends.

order_number.description: The associated order number, if any.

sold_to_email.description: This field indicates if it was sold to email.

net_amount.description: The net amount.

auto_renew.description: If true, the subscription automatically renews at the end of the current term.

trade_screening.description: Whether the subcription cleared trade screening check or not.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request See details. **Error Code:** `5313`
Invalid sort value. It must be one of: subscriptionNumber.asc, subscriptionNumber.desc, startDate.asc, endDate.asc, startDate.desc, or endDate.desc.
**Error Code:** `5320`
Invalid status value. It must be one of: active, pending_activation, cancelled, or expired.
**Error Code:** `5002`
Invalid date format. Expected format: YYYY-MM-DD.
**Error Code:** `5003`
Invalid duration. It must be one of: lastMonth, last90Days, last1Year, or custom.

discount_type.description: type of discount. supported values are "DealReg", "Partner", "Exception"

percent_value.description: discount in percentage. Either percent_value or amount_value is required but both should not be provided

amount_value.description: discount in amount. Either percent_value or amount_value is required.

apply_to.description: specifies how the discount will be applied. One time or recurring. Supported values are "ONETIME", "RECURRING", "USAGE", "ONETIMERECURRING", "ONETIMEUSAGE", "RECURRINGUSAGE" and "ONETIMERECURRINGUSAGE"

discount_level.description: Application scope of the discount. For example, if the value of this field is subscription and the value of the apply_to field is RECURRING, the discount applies to all recurring charges in the same subscription. Supported values are "priceplan" "subscription" "account"

get.summary: Get trial subscriptions for a Zoom partner
get.description:
Returns trial subscriptions for a distributor or a reseller. The subscriptions list can be filtered by end customer account number, subscription status, subscription number, start and end dates. By default, the list of active subscriptions in the last 1 month are retrieved.
Note: Please check the base URL for sandbox and production environments under Zoom Commerce section [here](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api). **[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:admin` **[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `zoom_commerce:read:subscription:admin` **[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`
